description:
Sawyer`s Doublade is the evolved form of Sawyer`s Honedge. It evolved sometime after Ash`s battle with Sawyer in XYZ 13 and before their battle in XYZ 26.
In the first match-up in the 2nd 3-on-3 battle of Ash vs Sawyer, Sawyer`s Doublade was paired up against Ash`s Noivern. Despite using Iron Defense multiple times to tire out Noivern, it tried to take advantage of a chance it thought it had but it backfired as Noivern used a combination of moves in the air to defeat Sawyer`s Doublade.
Sawyer`s Aegislash is the evolved form of Sawyer`s Doublade. It evolved sometime before the the start of the Kalos League.
name: Nidangill (Shouta)
